item.name: Home
item.description: A few years ago, while walking into the office, and a woman stopped me to say, “Girl, you look gorgeous.” I can’t remember what I did that day: I probably emailed ppl, sat in on conference calls, looked through some contracts. I can’t remember when I left the office or what I ate for dinner. […]
